projects.name: PipeX (CRM) - Customer Relationship Management System
projects.description: Customer Relationship Management System with a focus on improving customer relations and business efficiency.
highlights: A awesome pipeline based architecture for lead generation implemented.
Intuitive and user-friendly interface for managing company associations.
projects.architecture: Frontend (VueJS) <--> API (Laravel) <--> Database (MySQL/Redis) | Standard 3-Tier Web Architecture.

projects.name: SendX (Email marketing)
projects.description: Email Marketing Application, a cloud-based SAAS platform for email marketing, automation, and lead generation.
highlights: Implemented core email marketing features like automation workflows and campaign management.
Enabled unlimited email sends and powerful automation.
projects.architecture: Frontend (VueJS) <--> Web Server (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB | Background: Laravel Queue Workers (Redis/SQS) for high-volume email processing.

projects.name: Unite Living
projects.description: Project details are confidential according to company policy. Implemented a complex, large-scale distributed system.
highlights: Developed a large-scale, distributed system using AWS serverless components (Lambda, SQS, S3).
projects.architecture: Client (Vue/Meteor) <--> GraphQL API (ExpressJS) <--> MongoDB | Backend: Event-Driven Serverless (AWS SQS/Lambda/S3) for distributed processing.

projects.name: Digital Bondhu
projects.description: A job platform similar to BDJobs.
highlights: Built core job platform functionalities including job listings, searching, and user profiles.
projects.architecture: Standard LAMP/LEMP Stack: Frontend (Blade/Vue) <--> API (Laravel) <--> Database (MySQL).

projects.name: Treasure Wars - MMORPG Game
projects.description: MMORPG Game development using C# and Unity3D.
highlights: Developed game logic and backend services for a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG).
projects.architecture: Client (Unity/C#) <--> Game Server (Custom/Node/PHP) <--> DB (MySQL). Focus on low-latency communication.

projects.name: Meena Media Award - Unicef Bangladesh
projects.description: System for managing the Meena Media Award for Unicef Bangladesh.
highlights: Implemented a system for managing award submissions and the judging process.
projects.architecture: Web App (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB. Features: Multi-user roles (Submitter, Judge, Admin) and secure data handling.

projects.name: Adolescent - Unicef Bangladesh
projects.description: Web application project for Unicef Bangladesh focused on adolescent issues.
highlights: Developed a web application for a social awareness or resource distribution project.
projects.architecture: Web App (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB. Focus on user engagement, content delivery, and access control.

projects.name: BDTodays.com
projects.description: Online news portal, customized with WordPress.
highlights: Customized a WordPress installation for high-traffic, real-time news content delivery.
projects.architecture: Client (Browser) <--> Web Server (Nginx/Apache + PHP) <--> WordPress/MySQL. Optimized for content caching and high readership.

projects.name: ReApp
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application using React Native.
highlights: Developed a cross-platform mobile application using React Native.
projects.architecture: Client (React Native) <--> REST API (ExpressJS) <--> Database (MongoDB). Focus on shared codebase for iOS/Android.

projects.name: YouKnow
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application using React Native.
highlights: Developed a cross-platform mobile application using React Native.
projects.architecture: Client (React Native) <--> REST API (ExpressJS) <--> Database (MongoDB). Focus on data fetching and display.

projects.name: Panchabazar - Flutter
projects.description: Flutter App for daily corona updates.
highlights: Built a cross-platform mobile application for displaying real-time or daily data updates.
projects.architecture: Client (Flutter) <--> External REST API. Focus on lightweight API calls and UI rendering.

projects.name: QStatus - Flutter
projects.description: Flutter App for quickly generating status updates and sharing them.
highlights: Developed a utility app for quick content creation and sharing on mobile platforms.
projects.architecture: Client (Flutter) <--> Firebase (Firestore/Auth) for user data and storage. Focus on fast content generation.

projects.name: 7th March Speech (VR) - ICT Ministry
projects.description: Virtual Reality project for the ICT Ministry (Bangladesh).
highlights: Created an immersive Virtual Reality experience, utilizing professional 3D and motion capture tools.
projects.architecture: Standalone VR Application (Unreal Engine). Focus: Asset loading, spatial audio, and motion tracking logic.

projects.name: Roller Coaster (VR)
highlights: Developed an interactive and immersive Virtual Reality entertainment application.
projects.architecture: Standalone VR Application (Unity3D). Focus: Physics simulation, frame rate optimization, and asset rendering.

projects.name: QStatus (web)
highlights: Built a modern web application using a fast Node.js backend (ExpressJS) and a flexible data layer (GraphQL and MongoDB).
projects.architecture: Client (VueJS) <--> API Gateway (ExpressJS/GraphQL) <--> Database (MongoDB). Data is fetched efficiently using GraphQL queries.
